echoOrder0.form:
<form xmlns="http://echo.nasa.gov/v9/echoforms" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://ecsodl.nasa.gov/orderoptions">
  <model>
    <instance>
      <prov:packageOption xmlns:prov="http://ecsodl.nasa.gov/orderoptions">
        <!-- Distribution Specification-->
        <prov:dist>
          <prov:value>FtpPull</prov:value>
        </prov:dist>

        <prov:distributionSpecification name="FtpPull">
          <prov:odl name="PROCESSING_OPTIONS"/>
        </prov:distributionSpecification>
        
        <prov:distributionSpecification name="FtpPush">
          <prov:odl name="HOST_ADDRESS"/>
          <prov:odl name="USERNAME"/>
          <prov:odl name="PASSWORD"/>
          <prov:odl name="FTP_PATH"> </prov:odl>          
          <prov:odl name="PROCESSING_OPTIONS">Native Granule</prov:odl>
        </prov:distributionSpecification>        
      </prov:packageOption>
    </instance>
  </model>
  <ui>

    <select label="Distribution Options" multiple="false" open="false" ref="prov:dist" required="true()" type="xs:string" valueElementName="value">
      <item label="FtpPull" value="FtpPull"/>
      <item label="FtpPush" value="FtpPush"/>
    </select>

    <group xmlns:prov="http://ecsodl.nasa.gov/orderoptions" label="Ftp Pull Information" ref="prov:distributionSpecification[@name = 'FtpPull']" relevant="//prov:dist[prov:value='FtpPull']">
      <output label="Processing Options:" ref="prov:odl[@name='PROCESSING_OPTIONS']" type="xs:string"/>
    </group>

    <group xmlns:prov="http://ecsodl.nasa.gov/orderoptions" label="Ftp Push Information" ref="prov:distributionSpecification[@name = 'FtpPush']" relevant="//prov:dist[prov:value='FtpPush']">
      <input label="Host Address:" ref="prov:odl[@name='HOST_ADDRESS']" required="true()" type="xs:string"/>
      <input label="Username:" ref="prov:odl[@name='USERNAME']" required="true()" type="xs:string"/>
      <secret label="Password:" ref="prov:odl[@name='PASSWORD']" required="true()" type="xs:string"/>
      <input label="FTP Path:" ref="prov:odl[@name='FTP_PATH']" type="xs:string"/>
    </group>
    
  </ui>
</form>
